overview: A woman is scrolling through her cell phone in a park, surrounded by playing children. The film was commissioned in 2021 as part of a project by Punto de Vista Film Festival in which several filmmakers were asked by curators Garbiñe Ortega and Matías Piñeiro to film a letter to a filmmaker they admired. For ( Gibson wrote a love letter to three filmmakers – Barbara Loden, Nina Menkes & Bette Gordon –, women whose voices and characters have influenced her deeply in the last few years.
title: DEAR BARBARA, BETTE, NINA
